It has a nice little display screen that actually gives you an abundance of information, but will be hard for some to see as it is small.  It displays things like your recording names and or the name of the songs you have on the device as well as the track number and out of how many tracks are actually available in addition to if you are recording or pausing, etc.  It also displays status mode, play or record and surprisingly it shows a pc display when it is connected to a pc as well as other info.  Also, let me add - if you are unable to see the display easily in order to know if you are recording - it has an led recording light setting just for you.  If you are recording the light will display red - if you pause it, it will flash red - if you hit the record the second time to stop and save it, the red light will go off.Let's talk sound quality.  I was surprised that it actually sounds very clear and does a great job of recording quality sound.  It doesn't sound as loud as some devices I've heard, but as it is clear sound and doesn't distort, it's an acceptable compromise.  Plus if you want more volume, you can connect it's included earbuds and the sound is tremendous or you can even connect an external speaker. It doesn't appear to have a  mic port, but honestly this is intended to be a portable device - if you add 100 accessories how portable is it going to be?  So, just to easily throw into your pocket and use for dictation - it seems to work flawlessly.Data conection:  you can use the included usb charger/data cable to connect to a pc and it shows up just like a removable drive.  Which means you can easily copy your recordings off or onto the device as well as music files. The recordings format is wav and the music files that it can play back are formatted in mp3 or wma.  It's a great dictation recording device and the fact that it can also play any music files is a bonus in my opinion.It does have other bells and whistles that I will touch on briefly.  It does have a a-b repeat option - meaning if you set it, it will only repeat files from a-b.  It also has a function that will enable it to record ONLY when it hears sound above 30db-40db (VOR - voice operational function).  If the sound drops below that - it will stop recording.  It has a password option for turning on the device.  Which means you can keep your recordings very confidential.  It also has a monitor switch which is for it to either detect or not detect voices when the earbuds are plugged in - you can set it to on or off.Pros:- Has an 8GB capacity- Comes with a set time file and when data cable is connected to pc - only requires unzipping and then execute the file - works brilliantly and effortlessly (windows 8.1) - now my recordings have the correct date and time on the recordings-small and light weight- fits in pocket easily-fully charges in only 3 -4 hours-has roughly 4hrs of continuous recording ability until the battery needs rechargingCons:- music files can only be uploaded into the devices root as folder support is not available - which also means you can not define playlists as far as I can tell.Overall, this is a very capable device and does exactly what it was intended to do. It is small yet feels like it's made of good quality to last. I like the look and feel and the fact that it fits so easily into my pocket, so that I can take it anywhere on the fly.  Well done -5 stars!

Let me start with - this is NOT just a crock pot for those looking at it quickly.  This is a serious 4qt MULTI COOKER.  That means it really can do what your stove top can do and it can also do what your oven can do.  Out of the box - this thing is actually quiet beautiful.  The pictures do not do it justice.  It is indeed candy red and has a tempered glass lid with a handle (the picture doesn't show this well) that has a built in strainer/pour opening.  The pot itself has nice looking lifting handles on each side and feel very durable.  The inside is a removable nonstick cooking pot that has a pour spout.  So, let me just say - very easy cleanup.  It also comes with a steam basket that can be reversed to turn it into a roasting rack.  The unit itself has a nice digital control panel that ranges from temperatures of 110 to 450 F.  A stir tower can be purchased as an accessory, but it is not packaged with this unit - it is sold separately.Features:temp control - will do Fahrenheit and Celsius10 different cooking methods including a manual mode and 4 step by step modestimer (can be set up to 12 hours)auto warm mode (switches over to keep warm mode after the food is cooked and will keep food warm for up to 24hrs - some modes do this automatically - other modes this option can be selected manually)remembers the last mode used if you leave it plugged inThis unit sears, sautes, steams, roasts, simmers, slow cooks, fast cooks and more.  Basically the fact that this mulitcooker can go from searing to cooking pasta is amazing.  I could go on and on about all the wonderful things it can cook and the HOW it can cook them.  But, overall to keep it short and simple - if you can think it - you can cook it.  It has enough options that will allow the basic cook to DO and also enough options to allow the GENIUS CHEF to DO.  Very nice unit - I highly recommend it, you won't be disappointed.

This is an interesting game and actually becomes more or less interesting per who is playing the game.  Meaning, if you are playing with some smart creative people - this game is awesome.  At the start of the game you choose 5 candidates -can be real or made up.  Then per the cards that are drawn, you vote on which candidate the card is describing.  You can campaign for your candidates to ensure your vote is in the majority as the majority wins. It comes with the cards that put the candidates in various situations.  It also comes with the dry erase board to write your candidates names on.  The chips/coins and bidding spinners for each player are included.  This game will not get old fast as some do.  It really does depend on who you play with and what candidates are chosen, etc. as to the amount of fun it can be.  It's simple yet not dull.

I have a tremendous fear of snakes.  However, I do not like to kill things if it can be avoided.  I saw this on vine and jumped at the chance to try it.  I have a wood pile behind my garage and always have a fear of what I will find in there, especially in the warmer months.  I had never heard of anything like the snake shield repellent before so I was excited to try it.  Upon opening it does have a number of smells that hit you all at once (sulfur, cedar oil, cinnamon oil, and clove oil).  But, honestly it's not a bad smell.  I was expecting some type of powder and a more prominent sulfur smell - which isn't very pleasant. So, I was pleasantly surprised at the smell.  It actually looks more like cat litter without the sandy composition.  To use you just sprinkle lightly around the area you want to protect, forming an 8" band.  It suggest reapplying after a hard rain.  So far, so good!  I will update this review if I see a snake after using this product - but I am hopeful that it works and I will not.  The ingredients and how they effect snakes to deter them is sound logic.

My skin does feel softer and more moist after using this serum. I can't say that some of my deeper wrinkles have vanished - but I do think it has helped the overall tone and definitely has acted as a moisturizer. It comes out of the bottle via pump, so is easy to use and apply without waste. I did have one complaint on the pump - seems as I got about 3/4's of the way thru the bottle the pump stopped working easily.  Maybe the straw is too short in the bottle? But, other than that issue, the product feels good on the skin and you immediately feel your skin is hydrated.  Vitamin C is needed to make collagen. As we age so does our collagen level. Collagen is needed to keep us young looking (no wrinkles, etc.). Therefore if Vitamin C is needed to make Collagen and we need Collagen -then this product is definitely worth a try. A free sample was provided for evaluation. Marilyn

This is a great case for your phone.  It has a wallet compartment that will hold 3 cards and some money comfortably.  The front edges of the case come up just enough to be above your screen - which from low drops or just laying your phone face down will help protect the screen.  It also has it's own buttons for volume and power. It has notched edging along one of the back sides (very subtle) so that you can use one of your cards to insert into the notching and it becomes a kickstand for the case.  It has two positions, which is just based on flipping the phone on the opposite horizontal edge - but both positions are still horizontal/wide viewing as far as I can tell.  But definitely for horizontal (wide) viewing, the kickstand/card balancing actually does work.  I also have the wallet case for the galaxy s4 and this one does have a couple of improvements. One is the speaker area - it now does not have the upward vent, which I think just made the sound tinny and of course the genius notching on the edge for the kickstand idea.  Actually, the lack of kickstand was one of my big disappointments for the s4 case and the sound vent.  So, very impressive that they fixed both of my previous complaints.  Therefore, I can find NOTHING wrong with this design. It is a nice looking case and is also very functional as a case with a kickstand.  Very nice job!

These are very nice bags made in India.  They are just the right size - not too big and not too small.  They are great from carrying grocery items to carrying beach items to the beach.  They feel very durable and the straps are sewn/attached strongly enough that they will not pull away when a little weight is added to the bags (like books, etc.).  The bags I received are of the nautical them.  One is a cream color, one blue and the other blue stripped.  All feel like canvas material. These bags are 100% cotton and are machine washable in cold water.  They can also be tumble dried on low.  Overall, I am very impressed with the quality of these bags and am sure I will get many different type of uses from them.  They appear to be well made and well designed for durable wear. Well done!

Out-of-the-box:This is a very nice looking retro microphone. It comes with a well-crafted tripod microphone holder. The microphone has clear digital sound as well as looking very cool. I am actually using the microphone to dictate this review. Therefore, if you do not see any spelling errors or misplaced words, then the microphone is proving to be very clear. Basically, this mic is adorable and appears to be well-designed. Well done, 5 stars.

This is a very nice laptop cooler. It has four blue LED lit fans. It's not very heavy and appears to be well constructed. The cooler connects to your laptop usb port and also has an extra usb port so that you aren't actually losing a port by using it. It also has a control dial to enable controlling the fan speed. After using it for hours, my laptop wasn't even warm. The cooler definitely works and will save the life of your laptop. When components overheat they will break down. So, it's a small investment that will pay off big by saving a payout later. I recommend this item. I was provided a free sample for review.

This is the best Blu phone so far that I've had a chance to review.  Let's discuss the 13MP front and back camera.  Wow.  Usually this is where you're ripped off if you get a high end phone with 13MP camera - it's only in the back and the front camera is usually lacking.  Not with this baby - it is called Selfie for a reason. Also make no mistake - both cameras have a flash.  If the camera alone doesn't sell this phone, then consider that they have also improved the sound quality for this model too.  It also has HD recording (1080p). It has 16GB internal storage, but you can add up to a 64GB SD card to get more storage space.  It also has several other bells and whistles - like has energy efficient technology to help save your battery life and has it's own proprietary software to improve your pics.  In addition to the great cool features, it actually does quiet well as a PHONE. Although, I am not sure why these Blu phones are still shipping with Kitkat at this point instead of being updated to Lollipop or if an over the air update is scheduled for this particular phone.When you compare this phone to some of the Samsung Galaxy's - especially the newer ones, then it does fall short on features.  However, if you consider the price range of this device compared to any of the Samsung Galaxy's, then you can't actually beat it.  Just depends on if you have $800 plus to spend on a phone or $250.  Then your choice is clear.  This phone also comes with a case and screen protector as well as earphones and a charger.  Overall, it is an attractive well designed nice feeling phone and unbeatable for it's features weighed against it's cost.

This is a well built case for the Samsung Galaxy S6 and includes a screen protector.  It is extremely light and not bulky in any sense of the word.  However, it feels sturdy and strong on the phone.  It has several finger grippy areas to ensure you have a good grip on your phone while using it as well.  It also has some nonskid bumpers on the back side of the case.  It has easy access buttons that allow you to fully use your phone without any issues - adjusting volume, etc.  It also has a more pronounced or raised cut out on the back to allow usage and protect the phones camera lens when laying the phone down.  Basically, they thought of everything. This is a well designed good looking case that is impact resistant and will help protect your phone from normal drops, etc.

This product works great.  I was interested in trying it because it not only kills weeds it also fertilizes while doing so.  I was also concerned about using it in my yard as we have so many critters running around. The instructions say simply to keep everything off of the area you spray until it dries.  That was a huge relief and made it more doable and us not afraid to use it. It kills several different type of weeds including Dandelions and Clover.  My yard is running over of Clover.  This 32oz spray bottle covers 6000SF.

This is a great headset.  They have good and very clean sound.  They are comfortable to wear even though they are a bit heavy - a bit reminiscent of a headset from the 70's.  They come with 3 different cables -one with in-line controls and microphone for smartphones.  Also one cable is extremely long - so that's nice if you want to walk away from your laptop/device, etc. Just for testing purposes, I cranked my devices to full capacity just to see if they could handle it.  They could and no sound ever became distorted from any device. They are packaged nicely as well.  This is a nice pair - well done!

This is a great little humidifier, diffuser, etc.  You can add just a couple of drops of oil to your water and it easily becomes a diffuser.  I like that it runs via a usb cable.  Which means you can plug it directly into your pc or other usb ported devices or chargers as long as they are not more than 5 volts.  It also has an led light which has various colors to sooth the mood while using it as aromatherapy.  The other really nice thing about this unit is if you forget it and leave it unattended, it has an auto shutoff when it runs out of water.  It will also flash a red light that can be seen via the diffuser opening to let you know it needs to be refilled. Over all it's a nice device and I feel good about recommending it.  I was provided a free unit for review purposes.

This is an interesting looking bracelet. It is made from a very shiney metal, but feels more durable than it actually looks. it contains a very pretty set made of Cubic Zirconia.  It comes in a very attractive and well packaged "gift" box.  The bracelet does not contain a clasp, but instead it has a smaller looped chain at the end and is meant to place the wings thru the chained loop for containment.  I actually did that and decided it might be too losable from only letting it gracefully hang by the loop.  So I looped it thru twice and it feels more secure, but I think if you wear it casually and often until it goes unnoticed, you will probably come home without it as it can still easily work it's way out of the loop and off your wrist.  I would either recommend adding a clasp or only wear it to events where you won't forget you are wearing it.  Marilyn

The main package which after initially opening seals back like a ziplock bag and includes 4 patches for your forehead and 4 patches for your smile lines.  The forehead and sets of smile lines are packaged in individual smaller packages inside of the main package to assist in keeping the patches sealed in order to maintain their freshness. In order to apply a patch - you only need to remove the backing and place on the area for that patch design.Now for the patches themselves:  they feel cool on the skin and you do indeed feel like you are getting a treatment of some sort.  The great part is you only wear them for 10 minutes, which is doable for almost anyone.  Near the end of the 10 minutes, I could feel a little tingly sensation, but nothing painful or even enough to feel uncomfortable.  After removing the patch, the skin dries fast.  I could tell some subtle difference and didn't have any unrealistic expectations of a full blown miracle as I think some reviewers have had. It does act as a filler as many other products do and in so doing, it does seem to plump up the skin a bit to fill those lines.  Also, it is noticeable just as it advertises.  It also contains a hexapeptide, which is a substrate of Botulinum toxin aka Botox.  The hexapeptide in turn relaxes the muscles which does give a visibly better appearance. Or that would be true if injected into the skin.  I am not sure their is any evidence to prove that applying even Botox topically has any effect on wrinkles.  But, none the less - it also has other ingredients that help with collagen production and hydration, etc.  Overall, this is a reasonable priced product that does give a subtle noticeable difference in only 10 minutes.  Other than injections, this is a reasonable compromise to achieve some minor results.  Marilyn

Because this is water based, you really don't need to use as much. I found a dollop can do both legs and hands. It does not have the oily or greasy feel that some lotions leave after it dries. So the "wet" gives a fresher and more natural feeling after it dries. I would recommend this to anyone who has yet to find a lotion that compliments their skin.

I am a fan of hot wheels cars and this 5-car collection of the Justice League does not disappoint. The exclusive is Batman. Generally, Hot Wheels have been saturating the market with lots of Batmobiles over the past few years, so in on sense its not surprising its included, on the other hand, I would like to see other characters. The Wonder Woman car is the cleverest of the set, put in a clear see through plastic to replicate her invisible plane and other vehicles. Hot Wheels puts care and thought into their cars and have a high quality craftsmanship that has endured since their entrance into the die-cast scene. Recommended!

Wow! What a power tool. You can feel the weight in your hand. And when you turn it on, you almost expect to be zapped. But seriously, this is a great kit that is professional in both quality and accessories. You get 10 sizes for shaving from 8 all the way down to 1/2 size lengths. You also get a comb and scissors as well as a plastic cover to catch the shavings. It plugs into the wall, no chargeable version here. I have went through so many chargeable shavers and in the long run, there will be at least once where it will not charge fully and dies in the middle of a shave. You don't have to worry about that here. Plug it in and turn it on. Also has a lever to determine the closeness of the shave, or if you want to taper the cut. Comes complete in a plastic carrying case which is not the most durable plastic case, but serves its purpose effectively. Of all the shavers I have reviewed in the past, this one definitely stands as my favorite.

I am a graphic designer who uses this large format printer for creating film positives for screen printing. It gives a rich black when all the colors are present. The print is sharp and clean. After that, it is downhill. The first problem is that this printer goes through ink like a dehydrated person who just crossed the desert. It seriously lasts less than a month per cartridge. Which tells me either the computer is designed to lie about how much ink is actually left in the cartridge, or it uses an unnecessary amount while "cleaning and maintaining". It does allow you to print black only for a period of time but its not a true black. Secondly, because I work in a technical field, there are times when it will distort the printing by the way it pulls the paper through. Sometimes crooked, sometimes slightly off. So, when it works, I think its great. But it really is a high maintenance machine and the inks are expensive to keep pouring $60+ every 2-4 weeks.

"Jump in my Jumpsuit" nail polish from essie is a nice deep red color that lays on evenly and (according to my girlfriend), needed only two coat to maintain the nail polish from chipping. The color was brilliant, but not loud or obnoxious. Very quick dry and the consistency of the nail polish is thick enough so it does not drip, but thin enough to paint smooth strokes. After it was time to remove the nail polish, she discovered they were a little difficult and it also left a red hue on her fingernails. Maybe stronger nail polish remover? Overall its a nice brand and quality, however, the fact that it left some on her fingers was the one knock against it.

Go ahead, drop your iPhone. I dare you! Well, with this Gumdrop case, you can be fairly sure, dropping your phone will be less frustrating than having your calls dropped. The case is made of, what seems, like the same material that they make tires from, so it will maintain safety in its descent to the ground. I for one am not crazy about cases that make the phone very big, and the iPhone 6+ is already a big phone, so this makes it about double in thickness and a little wider. But when you pay $700 for a phone, you want to protect that s*** - even at the cost of fashion. Which, this is not the most beautiful case to look at, but its plain to see that it is out to do one job - and it does it! Phone cases have been exorbitant in pricing to begin with ($30 for plastic?), but give that has been the standard, $40 for this case seems a fair price. I would recommend this to anyone who has lady fingers or can't seem to hold onto objects very well and has a tendency to constantly drop things. iPhones are slick in material, especially new and the fact they are fragile, sometimes we treat them like eggs. So, with that in mind, I would highly recommend this.

I brushed twice daily. The initial "whiteness" was only noticeable as I smoke. I think someone who has readily pearly whites may not need such a product as they are more conscientious of their teeth to begin with and whatever they are doing already works. The texture of the toothpaste in on the gritty side with a type of sweet powdered peroxide taste. Would I recommend this product? It would not be my first choice, but I think for certain people, it would not be a bad idea to spend a few bucks more on their toothpaste.

Worked well on my friends face. No reaction to it and she felt it worked well. She likes to try all kinds of makeup to explore the different results that best suits her. It needed to be put on occasionally, but she was pleased with the results.

Its huge! This is the world map and is great for kids. I played with my niece and she loves to put the shapes together. We emptied the board and started formulating the continents and each piece has a picture to give an idea of what that culture is about. It was a nice educational tool as well as a fun way to spend time with your kids. In addition, it also hangs up on a wall. It is a bit heavy, do you will need something strong to hold it up. The pieces, although wood, are magnetic, so they will stay put. You can do it on the table, or once it is hanging up. Very cool item!

We already have a set up with ATT and was not sure how to implement this. But upon looking at it, I set it up as an alternate router by just adding an ethernet cable. Once that was plugged in, the network recognized it and I am able to use the setting applied with the TP-LINK. I found it has a very nice download speed and seems to be a consistent rate as well. This was a simple set up which offers a nice connection and so I have no problems with this device and would recommend it to anyone.

I was excited to use this program to handle my accounting for my small online business. It is completely online, so you only receive a card in a relatively large plastic box. Unnecessary packaging, if you ask me. So upon activating my one year subscription to the Sage One Accounting service, I needed to access my bank accounts. While the first was a Credit Union, it had trouble accessing it. I tried over and over and it just would not access the info, even though Sage recognized my bank. So i decided to try my PayPal account. This would not go through either. Lastly I tried my BOA credit card. This worked. After a few days of giving up, I decided to try it again. Again, I was met with an error. I thought maybe my bank wont allow this program to interact. So I went to the online tech support, and sure enough, as I posed my problem, access to the Credit Union was permitted. Not by any magic of Sage One, but more likely Murphy's Law. Needless to say the tech support guy was friendly and informative. The PayPal account, however, he stated that Sage One does not currently support. I asked the techie why I read an article that Sage One is supporting PayPal? He responded that they allow invoices to be sent out for PayPal payments, but you cannot access your PayPal account directly.The program wil require time and patience to set it all up, but it is easy to navigate and helps budget and show your transactions that can be updated from your bank. You can also set any goals, whether financial, personal or investment-wise. I will continue to use this despite some missing elements as it will be helpful with my primary banking. As I look now, the cost is only $25 which to me is a great deal for this program and worth it at that price.

I enjoy Alton Brown's GOOD EATS on so many levels. First, the obvious - the food. He shows you many ways in which to cook a particular food, or within a certain category of food. Second, AB comes from the school of Harold McGee's "On Food and Cooking" where the science of food becomes applicable in understanding why foods react the way they do. How certain foods react with different metals and why some foods get along and others do not (depending on what you do to them). So Alton extends this information in a fun, visual way. AB's humor, to me, really makes this show a fun way to learn about cooking. He has silly characters throughout, running gags from show to show, and has a geeky mannerism that makes his character charming. His style of directing is very well controlled and organized. His panning shots along a counter-top, with ingredients lined up, makes for easy "digestion" of the recipe. He includes little bits of history throughout the show about food or some interesting incident concerning the food. All in all, AB packs a high amount of information through both visual and his hyper-verbal manner of spewing information. If you enjoy cooking or are thinking about it - look no more! This is your source. I also recommend the three books which covers every episode in an almost as informative way.

Ok, maybe not really really. But at least able to actually pick things off a shelf. This supermarket from the Calico Critters series of animal figures who come to buy their produce, canned goods and dairy products. The selection of food goes far beyond a generic organic supermarket, but offers oil and vinegar, pretzels, condiments, etc. Yes, there are lots of parts! So I would just put out a blanket hazard statement that if your kid is at the biting stage, its probably best to wait or keep away as they are small. In addition, unless they are well organized, its easy to lose these little parts as well. It is made so you can design how the store is set up and what goes on what racks. Stickers also available to place throughout the store to make it complete. Again, like their other stuff, it is very well detailed unlike anything I grew up with. A very cute toy for those who like doll houses and similar types will certainly enjoy this!

The Calico Critters is a popular children's dollhouse type world that has been around since the 1990's, beginning in Japan, then migrated to the States. The Ice Cream Truck follows the line further outside the house setting and adds an outdoor event to the fantasy world. The Ice Cream Truck is both mobile and highly detailed with many little parts ranging from ice cream scoopers, ice cream cones, ice cream, and even soft serve ice cream! You can design and arrange the internal parts yourself inside the truck. Also a set of decals to set on and around the truck and a menu of deserts. Its a fun item that can also teach organization for kids.

As a book collector myself, I never realized that books had been collectible for a lot longer than I was aware. This book steps into New York during the 20's where book shops were by the dozens. Some specialty shops, rare and antiquated books, and of course modern books. I am not sure "best sellers" were of the time, but I am sure there were popular titles. And with this was a well known section of New York in Manhattan known as Book Row. Here is where the setting takes place and where a book dealer would enlist homeless people to steal books for him. These were rare first editions and very valuable. If you like true-crime and mystery/detective novels, with a bit a history thrown in for good measure, this is definitely the book for you!

Author Andrew Carroll embarks on a cross-country tour to many houses, farms, buildings, and sites to learn more about an American history that does not get paid much attention to. This includes inventions, people and certain modern practices took place, where an elucidation is evoked and explained which gives context to American as a nation. Some are remarkable, such as laughing gas, while others seem more like footnotes, like Al Capone's brother.Although the author took a tour of America in writing this book, it is not organized according to his travels, but more about time and then categorized according to the discovery or historical importance. While it reads like a travelogue in some respects, because of the way it is organized, I think it was a misstep to categorize the way it is. It might have been more interesting to read it more in the style that he presents it. So instead I was more interested in flipping to points of interest, rather than be interested in his personal discoveries.Unearthing information from the past can be difficult for stuff that has minimal published material, and talking to people who have lived or known from the time are equally becoming scarcer, so it would seem prudent to collect this data while it is available. Carroll is a competent writer who is passionate about his material and also respects his subject matter. I gave the book three stars primarily on the books organization that it does not lead me chapter to chapter to various states, settings, or locations in a logical order, but rather, again, some sort of encyclopedic method that could have been better utilized with America as a backdrop to the landscape of his discovery.

There were some weak spots in my house where I like to do some work and when this came to me to try out, I thought it might be helpful. I plugged them in, and it was very easy set up. Once they were on, I tried it in various spots of my house and it seemed to help a great deal. May not be the best or the fastest, but it is a thousand times better than it was and so now I can work where I like to. So I am pleased with this set up without much hassle beyond just plugging them in.

I am sure there are hard core fans of Miss Fisher and these murder mysteries. Upon this review, I have never heard of it or the books from which this was inspired. While it has a strong fan base, being someone who never heard of it and watched this, I cannot say I walked away a fan or interested in this series any further. The production values are good and the stories were well told, but there was a component that was just not appealing to me. Maybe it was the acting, the actors and actresses, the time period. I cannot place any specific on this, but I was just left sort of ho-hum about the whole thing.So if you like mysteries and whodunits, you might enjoy this. But these kinds of stories are not my type of entertainment so I gave it a pass.

I grabbed this less as a haircut, but more for beard maintenance. My previous version, also a Remington, seemed to get easily overwhelmed if you are trimming off too much at once. This one, however, seemed more industrial and ready for what ever you bring to it. I am not a hairstylist, or want to cut my own hair, but having it for as a beard trimmer is very nice. Its clean and straight each time and consistent.The touch controls are nice to the eye, but not very necessary. At times they are even confusing. The charge, once full has a very good life which is nice and can work off the plug if needed.Overall, as a beard trimmer, I would recommend this. There are accessories that aid towards haircutting length and not beard length, so some adjustments need to be made if that is your intentions.

What better fun would it be than to make edible alien guts? Well, DOCTOR DREADFUL - ALIEN AUTOPSY is pretty much just that. You get what you see and 4 packets of candy mix. All that is needed is water and 4 double A batteries. Its pretty fun to put together and add the mixture into the alien and wait for the magic to happen. It is suggested that you read the instructions.The Pros of this is the fun factor. Like I said, its fun making the mix and putting it into the alien. I think thats where the pros end.The Cons? The amount of time and effort compared to the results does not pay out well. The gummy eyes and lungs it recommends to remove and put into fridge to expedite the solidification of the candy. So I felt this should have been noted before putting the whole thing together because its not easy taking the parts on an off, not to mention a pain.The gummy eyes and lungs worked well. The intestines were a mediocre success. They looked good, but wet candy does not taste very good. Maybe its supposed to be on the slimy side.Lastly, is the stomach which is a frozen cookie. I am not sure the amount was correctly stated. It says 5 scoops of stomach mix, and 2 scoops of water. The instructions say to pour that into the stomach area, but it just is a crumbly mess and not a liquidy goo like its supposed to be.Finally, none of it tasted very good. It was a cross between Vitamin C and a bland oreo cookie. Otherwise I felt it was all rather tasteless.Overall it was fun to do, but a lot of work putting it together, taking it apart, mixing things up, all for very small portions of candy. Repeated mixing needs to be done which means cleaning the utensils and the trays each time to do it again. And for small portions.Caveat - It might be worth considering, this review is coming from a 40-year old male, so a 10 year old might love this and provide hours of fun and curiosity. As an adult, I found the fun factor high, but the results were improperly mixed.

I had gotten a set of these awhile back, that had a few more implements in them than this one, but these have a great quality feel to them. The metal is smooth. Has textured sections, which helps keep it from slipping while in use. I wish they included instructions of some kind to tell you which ones works best for what types of blemishes and stuff, I mean you can try them out on different ones etc, but I honestly thought about getting all my teen nieces and nephews their own sets, but without being able to tell them or them be able to read, specific tips, tricks or instructions it makes it a little hard to gift and they seem more clinical, as if you need to know medical stuff to use them. Received for review, would recommend, love that there are colors also.

Very nice simple dream catcher. The strings are actually tied on and attached directly to the center and not glued like other types of dream catchers, while this is still a bulk manufactured item, it definitely has the look of being handmade. Received for review, I like it. The one I received looks exactly like the colors in the one pictured.

Very lightweight, extremely sharp blades. I like that there is not a handle, because the last one I had, the handle broke completely off, this one grinds by the power of your hand. Which without the crank handle means I have to put less inside, but otherwise works great. The one con to this 5 in 1 spice grinder, is the threads are not clean. Twisting open the sections is smooth and easy, however when you go to twist/screw the sections back together, they do not line up well, and catch, and jump threads. The middle and bottom sections both did this. The top section does not have threads and does not screw on. It simply sits on top. However with that being said, my husband took a piece of scotch bright to debure it and smooth the threads down. Received at a discounted rate for our honest opinion. It's okay, not the best, top of the line, but gets the job done. The threads should have been cleaner, as nobody wants little slivers of metal in their grind.

This is extremely small! I never read the dimensions and probably should have prior to purchase. However with that being said, it's much stronger than it looks. The wheels move effortlessly along carpet AND grass with an easy 70+ pounds on this. They even included a strap to help keep your boxes stationary and help eliminate shifting and causing the cart to become unbalanced.Quick movements or turns will cause the cart to tip sideways, but general, normal walking seems to be no issue what so ever. This cart folds down very compactly. The top handle section fold down and back from the center section, while the holding cart section, folds up and towards the middle section.  You can then use the strap to wrap up and around the cart to keep it folded in place. At this point the card is maybe 4-5 inches tall and can be stored just about anywhere. I received this at a discounted rate. It doesn't look like much, but it works great.

Very sharp knife! This knife arrived exactly as pictured, packaged in a nice gift-able box, with plenty padding around, below and above the knife. The blade is extremely sharp, and can easily glide through a piece of paper on arrival.The only issue I have with this knife, could possibly be the way I actually use a knife. I tend to start at the bottom area of the top of the blade and slide downward and toward me, mainly using an up and down chopping motion. The back end of the blade doesn't seem to start cutting like my go to knife does, but once you get towards the top of the blade, it goes through smooth and quickly. I ended up switching the way I was chopping and tried starting at the back of the blade and slice downward, while pulling toward me and that worked much more efficiently.Overall I think its a great knife. Really sharp, but seems you have to use it a certain way to get the proper smoothness to the cut. I received this at a discounted rate for my opinion. I honestly like it and would recommend to those who use knifes a certain way, but for me, I will most likely not use this as often as my go to.

Good sound, my husband works in a machine shop and likes this speaker because even on a medium high setting he can still hear the music without having to blast it. Included carabiner clip which he uses to hang up out of his way and also helps create more of an all around sound. Included a charging cord, and direct plug and play cord.One charge last him a 10 hour shift and still doesn't die. He usually recharges daily for the next day. It usually take about 2 hours to charge back to full for the next day. The very first charge after dying completely the first time, took roughly 5 hours. Received at a discounted rate for review. Nice speaker. The sound quality is pretty good, projects well, doesn't distort. Connects to Bluetooth easily.  Would recommend.

My husband gives this 5 stars! He says it's very comfortable, most belt when you sit forward seem to press into his stomache and feel uncomfortable and like it's poking, This belt does NOT do that at all. He has worn is with khaki shorts and jeans and likes the look and the feel while wearing both. Says he would recommend. We received for review.We got size 40 belt, my husband wears 38. This has extra support strip on the back of the belt behind the holes to help keep the belt intact. There are plenty of holes for expansion (lol) or vise verse. The belt is genuine leather, has a brass colored buckle. There is stitching all along the edges and has "Wolverine" Stamped into the leather.

I really like the selfie sticks that require not batteries, no charging, no power! This selfie stick has a spring cord that has enough stretch to fit almost any phone. I own the Galaxy Note3 which is a larger phone and this cord reaches just fine with extra give. I did not have to change any settings for this selfie stick to work. The stick glides to extend easily and does not get stuck The extension has a slight groove in it that runs the length of the stick, which helps keep your sections from rotating on each other, which could eventually rip or tear the wiring inside the rod sections.I received this for free or at a discounted rate for my honest opinion. This type of selfie stick is one of my favorites and would recommend. Especially for those with no Bluetooth.

Great Bluetooth earbuds. Arrived very well packaged. The Bluetooth connected easily to every device we tried. We tried Note3, GalaxyS11, Samsung Tablet, and even my daughters Bluetooth laptop connect easily. That however also meant I lost them to her as she took them back to her dorm with her. She told me she fell asleep with them in and they stayed playing all night. Included charging cables and even includes direct plug cord as well. Received discount for review. Would recommend. One of the best we have tried so far.

Paired easily with my Samsung Galaxy Note3 upon scanning. I did not have to change any settings to make this selfie stick work. Received for review. Arrived as expected. Exactly as described. No issues. Works well. Would recommend. Easy to operate and the extension glides in and out easy as well.

I purchased this in Navy Blue. It is a really dark navy blue. Included two pillow shams with the same pleated look. Standard Pillows fit well inside and are easy to get in. Queen pillows also fit, very snuggly. Has button closure if using with a duvet. Can be used as a stand alone cover also. I like. Would recommend.

We like these socks. My daughter and I share socks quite often because we both like different designs and colors and combinations. I only wear them in the winter months, so these are right up my ally. I love the design of them. I can wear them dressed up or with jeans and they look super cute with both! They fit snug, so I don't fell like I am dragging fabric around on my feet. The toe room is great. These are really soft. Much softer than I thought they would be, and very warm. Not to thick that it makes my feet sweat, they seem pretty breathable. But thick enough that I feel the warm and softness actually hugging my feet. I received these at a discounted rate for my honest opinion. I honestly like these. Would recommend. The ONLY con I have for these is I wish there were more color options. I'd love these in a mixed solid color set also.
Great reel. Still checking it out, but so far so good. will update.

These pencil cases/make-up pouches are made really well. The stitching is nice and tight, no loose strands all over the place. The inside is a striped cloth pattern, but is also stitched in very nicely. You could actually turn these inside out and use them for a completely different look. The zippers are good quality, and metal. Not plastic. These hold standard size pencils easily with a little extra room, to make getting them in and out easy also. These can hold a good amount of writing tools, pens, pencils, scissors, etc. Lots of room. Received for review. Would recommend. You get all 4 shown. The ones I received, look exactly as pictured, right down to the color/design combination. Very pleased with my purchase.

These socks are great! Fit my daughter and I both perfectly, we wear 7.5 - 8 us shoe size. They feel seamless. These are truly low cut, sitting below the ankle. Received a promotional discount for my honest opinion. We honestly like these. My daughter left me with the pair I had on my feet at the time I showed them to her, and took the rest of them back to college with her. She later sent me a pic after washing them to show they went back to original shape. So they retain their shape and comfort after washing! Would recommend.

These arrived with no power source what so ever. My son had a cord that plugged into it and we also later realized our laptop chargers would also work. But it really makes no sense.The light string is just that. a string with little dots of light. Each section or dot of light has like a dot of hot glue looking material over it. Maybe the size of a flattened pea. Clear. They go out of there way to make these about the thinnest lights I've ever seen, and then we have a huge bulky power source to go with it.. ?!?!? When I tried to put them around a plant, along a shelf and even inside a plastic pumpkin, every time, the power cord was to heavy and would pull the lights out of place...Anyways.. once I found a power source to actually see if the lights worked or not, I was able to see that all of the sections illuminated. It's actually pretty bright for the size and style of string light it is. Overall it's unique, interesting and bright, but I personally will not be using these.

These lights are great. Easy to use anywhere. Extremely bright for being battery operated. I received these in green and it is a bright green. All lights worked. Has on off switch. Can be used just about anywhere. The battery box is small which makes it easy to hide out of site. No issues, exactly as described and as pictured. Received for review. Nothing negative to say. Nice lights. Work great.

I am giving it 3 stars because I had one hell of a time setting this up and I'm usually pretty good with computer hardware and "plug n play" type of devices. I ended up having to go into my settings and change things, honestly not sure what all at this point, I changed and unchanged and tried different settings over and over and finally at some point I did something right because now it works.It works great actually. Once I was able to get the settings set up correctly and change some settings on my audio, I was able to use the microphone with no issues. If you go into the properties you can even select if you want to be able to hear what you are recording or no. I like that because it allows us to use it for simple recordings or for fun like Karaoke just by changing a simple setting.I received this at a discounted rate for my honest unbiased opinion. While I now like it a lot and plan to utilize it much more now that we got it all figured out, it was honestly a pain to configure. I would have loved to see better more detailed instructions, or perhaps some sort of software wizard that helps with the install. I know for a fact if half of my family had gotten this, it would have been returned or sat on a shelf never to be used again. Its to confusing and time consuming.. BUT to be fair, if you can figure it all out and set it up correctly it's actually pretty decent microphone.

When given the opportunity to review this wall mounted fish tank at a discounted rate, I jumped at the chance. My daguther recently moved into the dorm and the only pets allowed are fish. She took this fish tank to her dorm and the 4 girls (her roomates) took the bus to the mall and got a new Beta Fish. This is how their process went."We washed it with hot water then we put Luke warm water in it and put a few drops of this stuff to neutralize the water and then hung it on the wall with the nails provided and left it there overnight then the next morning we transferred the fish in and he really likes it."They have been admiring their new fish tank for about a week now. NO issues. The tank is beautiful and tranquil looking and the beta looks amazing in the tank!

This shirt is super cute. I love the color. I was hoping the color was close to the screen color when I ordered and IT WAS!! I was thrilled. Its a unique color that allows you to wear it casually or on a more sophisticated evening. I also like how long the shirt it. The bottom of the shirt does not look like it has the hug effect when you hold it up, but when you put it on, it instantly hugs the waist area, creating a bunch effect. The bottom can be bunched up how you like or can be pulled down slightly to create a different look.My daughter tried this shirt on with a nice black pencil skirt we also received for review and they looked pretty good together. This shirt was a little wrinkled out of the package, but after washing, the wrinkles disappeared with no issues. We received this at a discounted rate in exchange for our opinion. Over all its a nice versatile shirt. I personally feel they run a little small, but not extreme difference. If this was labeled as juniors clothing instead of women's, I'd say the fit was perfect.

This ladies flair pencil skirt is a nice black skirt. I like the pleated look of the front design. The design is solid, and does not bunch or move when walking or sitting. It is a stitched in design, not a layered design. I bought this in a Large as the size chart says it's equivalent to a womens 14/16. My daughter wears a womans 11/12 or Juniors 12/13. This in a size large fit her perfectly. I don't think I have ever bought her a large anything. lolThis pencil skirt sits above the waist, but the elastic/stretch fabric material makes it comfortable and easy to move around in, walk in, sit in. The fit is snug, but not so snug that it looks like it's painted on. Its a great body shaper all by itself as well. Very flattering, especially for your butt! Received at a discounted rate for my honest opinion. I honestly like it on my daughter, and believe it would make a great skirt for business, interviews, or even a night out!

Simple Stainless Steel Pint Glasses. I am not sure what to say about them. They are nice size for just about any beverage. Being stainless they are easily washable. The outside of these cups have a nice shiny surface, the inside is a little less of a smooth finish as the outside, but doesn't seem to be an issue. Overall nice sturdy glasses, does not seem like they would tarnish so far. Received for review. I have had no issues what so ever with these glasses. Easy to clean, easy to use, stack-able... No negatives.. Actually these glasses are nice enough to engrave for personalization or making gifts for the holidays.

Well I honestly thought my kids would fight over these. The headband/eye mask is a thin material and the ear buds built in are flat, making it easy to put on your head and align to your ears. The cord is pretty long, but when sleeping it just seems to tangle up. My 18yr daughter tried these first and didn't last more than 20 minutes. She said they were just to uncomfortable. The headband was snug, but the earbuds inside were pressed against her ears to hard and the cord was to much to deal with. The sound quality was fine.My 15yr old son tried them next and decided they were just to hot to keep on his head. And that was that. I tried offering them to a niece and a neighbor girl who both also had no interest. I received these for review. I personally thought they were a pretty neat idea, the kids not so much. The sound quality is pretty good for such a simple headset, but the comfort level is just not there.

These microfiber cleaning cloths are great. We use nothing but these types of cleaning cloths on all our electronics. From our TV's, laptops, computers, tablets and phones. I also keep them separate from other cleaning cloths. The microfiber helps grab any dust or debris on your electronics, while also leaving a nice streak-free surface.These particular microfiber cloths do not feel exactly like the ones I am used to using. My husband says they feel exactly the same, but to me, these seem to have a silicone/rubber feel added to them. They feel like microfiber with a little added grip or something. Like those cupboard liners they make to keep your dishes from sliding around. Aside from this disagreement, we both think this is a nice set overall. Received for review.
did not work at all. Contacted company twice by email. No response. Have tried 3 different batteries in it, including a brand new out of the package and NOTHING...

I purchased these at a discounted rate for our honest unbiased opinion. My 15 year old son has been getting into working out and has been doing sit ups and push ups daily. I thought he would enjoy trying these out and having a way to keep track without having to focus on counting.At first he looked at me, like what the heck are these. After I explained what they were, he took them and tried them out for himself. His favorite part was that, even when he tried to mess up the reading, it could tell if he was doing a full push up or not. He said it never read wrong. He said at one point he spent more time trying to get it to read wrong, more than actually using it and it just never did. He now uses it all the time and if anybody is coming over he puts them up on the shelf out of site. He loves them and doesn't want anyone else using them.Overall these push up counter bars are a great addition to any workout routine.

These small flood lights are great. I have changed out a few bulbs in the house and a couple outside. I have had them in for a little over a week now and so far they seem just fine. The illumination is pretty standard for a 50W bulb. I have had no issues what so ever with compatibility so far. Received for review. Honestly no complaints as of yet. Seem to be a great option for replacement bulbs, plus I personally like how they look like mini flood lights. Good set.

This Paw Patrol backpack is great! The material is a mix of plastic like and canvas. The character design is bright and bold and plastic, making it easily cleaned with a damp cloth. The Straps have a little extra padding. The pockets on the sides of the bag, are large and can accommodate a nice size thermos, or easy grip water bottle with adequate space.The inside of the bag has TONS of room. You can easily fit, notebooks, folders and books in there with plenty of room, as well as a set of gym clothes or extra winter wear. The bag is light weight to begin with. If you need a large bag for your child, this is definitely a great choice.Received discount for review. I like it a lot.The ONLY con I see with this bag, is the size. For little bitty kids, it may be a little to big. But for say average sized 5 and up this would be a great school bag backpack!

This is a great set of of gel ink pens. The colors are bright and bold. The ink flows out instantly and smoothly the FIRST time. I checked every single pen and did not have to scribble or start any of them. The ink came out instantly and glided across the paper with ease.This particular set has 12 Glitter pens, which you can tell these apart easily from the glitter, as the pen shaft is completely see through, which is great to let you know how much ink is left. It also includes 6 Neon and 6 Pastel, now most of these are easy to tell apart, but some of them it's hard to tell if they are considered neon or pastel, and a few of them look exactly the same of paper. Not enough to be an issue, but personally I would have liked if the pens had the color/type on the pen itself.The only pen in this set that I had any kind of issues with was the white pen. It seems to clump up quicker the more you use it than the rest. Not sure if its the ink itself or what the issue is, but I don't use the white often anyways. I received these at a discounted rate for my honest unbiased opinion and I honestly like this set. Lots of color options and after using these off and on for a couple weeks now, the ink hasn't moved much, which leads me to believe these have a long life. Would recommend.

These glasses are STUNNING! First they are huge and hold quite a bit. They have a nice clink sound when to "toast" them. The painted area of the wine glass is just beautiful. We put a red and white in these glasses just to see the difference, the painted effect on the glasses just adds to the beauty when filled. I really can't explain just how pretty these are by themselves. Makes me not want to use them at all and just put them on display. received for review. Love them.

I have been using this case since it arrived. I literally took it out of the package and snapped my phone into the plastic holder. There is nothing covering the front or front edge of the phone. The Note3 fits perfectly, snug and not loose at all.This wallet case has two card slots on the side of the case and one larger pocket. The included stylis is about 2 inches long. Real tiny and has a plug to be able to plug the stylis into your phone for easy access.The only negative I have about this case is the color is already peeling off. The material it is made of just seems to come off with any kind of abrasion near it. The flap that helps close up the case, has a really powerful magnet in there. It attaches to just about anything magnetic it comes in contact with. I received this at a discounted rate for my honest opinion.Overall its a nice, sturdy, great fit cell phone wallet, but if your wanting something that stays looking nice, this is not the one. Mine looks like I have had a couple months to a year already. Aside from that I love it.

These are awesome!! I have tons of trees and always have piles and piles of leafs. We have been clearing out paths and campsites in our backwoods for a few years now and raking and raking and raking leaf piles onto tarps to drag to a designated area can get tiresome.These have been extremely helpful. Being able to pick up a huge pile of leafs in one swoop is extremely time saving. Even for someone who is shorter and has shorter arms, these are great.Your hands slip into the back and it has sort of a brace piece to help keeps your hands in place while scooping and grabbing your pile of debris. The opening is large and can accommodate many hand sizes easily.  This has made yard clean up so much easier and quicker. I received these at a discounted rate or for free for my honest unbiased opinion. I honestly love these and would recommend.

I charged this for a few hours with very little difference. I thought maybe the lights might be broke so I went ahead and used it with galaxy Note3 phone and after and hour of being plugged into the power bank, it had only charged 12%. I ended up plugging it back into the wall outlet to charge again and left it plugged in all the rest of that day and into the next. Finally I noticed all of the I dictator lights were lit, which meant that the power bank was full.  The next day I used it again. With my Note3 and again without using it, just sitting there, two hours later it wasn't even half charged from 1/4 charge.Seems to keep the device from dying, but doesn't charge it well for the output it has. Received at a discounted rate for honest unbiased review. I honestly have used so many of these power banks now, that this one is just not worth it. Lower mah power banks work better, longer and quicker than this one.

Overall these are nice quality socks. They have a good thickness that feels comfortable and breathable, but not to thick that they feel heavy or sweaty. The height of these no show socks are a little high, for what I would normally consider no show. These completely cover my ankles. No show to me, stop below my ankles.As for the size, I personally think they are big. The shoes size described in the descriptions says 5-9, well that is quite a range in itself. I wear a 7 1/2 -8 and these were to big for me. They fit snug on my feet and against my skin, but there was so much extra toe room, it just felt funny.My daughter who is closer to an 8 than I am, also had lots of toe room left, especially by the baby/pinky toe. After seeing this on us, my husband who is a size 10.5 - 11 in mens, put them on and aside from being a little too snug/tight for his comfort, they fit his foot size perfectly. And completely covered his ankles as well.I received these at a discounted rate for my honest unbiased opinion. While I honestly think they style, shape, feel is comfortable, the sizing is horribly off.

My husband has been using these for his work lunches for about a month now. They are extremely easy to stack and store, which I love. The sections have great portion sizes for him. I wasn't sure there would be enough room for him, but they are deeper than you think. I like that the lid is semi see through, to easily recognize whats inside, but also it snaps around the edge of the container, creating a stronger seal.I also like the rectangular shape. It's not so big, that it can not fit into a standard size lunch box and not to small that you don't feel satisfied after eating. Received at a discounted rate, for my honest review.

A few years ago my daughter and I got into the habit of straightening our hair. We both have thick, heavy, long, naturally semi curly hair. Hence why we straighten.. lolAnyways, I have used so many different kinds of clips to hold our hair out of the way, that until now I have only been real successful with those claw clips. Because even a small section of our hair, when twisted, up and tucked away becomes a mini bun. How many clips do you know will hold a mini bun? Not many, so claw clips have to suffice.BUT then I got these.. I did not even know they made clips like this.These work for very thin layers of hair, all the way to a full mountain. I was able to hold ALL of my hair up for a full day, with ONE of these clips. It was a spring cleaning kind of day and I grabbed my hair up, twisted it all up and into a big bun on the back of my head and one handed grabbed one of these clips. I slid the flat bottom side under the bun and the top grabbed as I released the clip. Honestly it help pretty well just like that... BUT... I also dislike little hairs falling down around my head and neck area, especially when cleaning.. (spiders, ninja dance, embarrassment.. etc you get the idea.. ) These clips have an added feature that after you clip it in place, the top has a hinged section that you can press down and it go inward towards your hair center. As it glides back out, it has little catches where the clip will stay in place sort of like a ponytail holder.  I would guess, it was at least 2+inches of mound up hair it was holding.. It lasted ALL DAY. No hair falling out, no adjustments.. I wish they were prettier,  I'd use them for daily wear.. Received for review for honest unbiased opinion. I love them. Would recommend. I will be purchasing more of these.

I honestly did not think I would like this brush because of the size. I have very thick heavy sort of long semi curly hair.. I looked at this brush and though yeah right...I first tried it out of the shower with wet hair, as it seems much easier to brush my hair when it's wet. This brush went through with no issues. I was shocked. I could not believe how easily it slide through my hair, and that I could actually feel the bristles touching my scalp. I have to admit, I ended up brushing my hair for a good long time. I liked the scalp massage I was receiving.Later that day, I put the brush through my hair again, after it had been pulled up and down all day, and was completely dry and somewhat in disarray. Again the brush went completely to my scalp, and had no issues brushing through. The few snags I did have, came right out with very little messing around.I am impressed and now kind of feel regret for never trying one of these before. I would definitely recommend. I wish I had one of these when my daughter was a little girl, would have made school mornings so much easier!!! I received this for my honest unbiased opinion and I honestly love it.

I am enjoying this pre-seasoned Cast Iron Skillet. I received a few different pieces of this companies cast iron cookware and so far this is by far my absolute favorite. As I did with the other pieces I received, I washed in hot water, heated and re-oiled each piece of Cast Iron before use.This 10.5in skillet is the perfect size for a side dish for large gatherings or a main meal for my small family of four. I have cooked pancakes (although I do have their Utopia Kitchen Pre-Seasoned Cast Iron Round Griddle 10.5 inch also, however this particular morning we had a larger crowd and it was easier to use multiple cookware) deep dish pizza, flat bread pizza, eggs, kielbasa glazed with syrup, which left an ooey gooey, caramelized mess in the pan. I have had NO ISSUES at all with sticking, food breaking or even with cleaning.I have not cooked inside my house one time since I received all these pieces of cast iron cookware. There is nothing nicer than cooking over the fire in the woods while sitting by the creek. This skillet has truly made me a huge Cast Iron fan now.Another bonus is the lid from their Utopia Kitchen Pre-Seasoned Cast Iron Dutch Oven with Skillet Cove, 3.5 Quart! also fits perfectly on this skillet. And makes a nice dome for their pancake pan as well when just wanting to heat something up or toasted cheese sandwiches.

I received this at a 50% discount to review. While I love every other piece I have gotten from this company thus far, this one was not as easy to use. I washed the cast iron dutch oven with hot water and then heated and oiled it as I did with all the other pieces prior to use. I also did the same with the lid. However when we went to use the dutch oven, I had horrible issues with sticking, even letting it sit over the hot coals directly to help at least maybe burn it so I could get it cleaned out. Didn't work. I ended up having to flip it over and set the dutch over the flames and hot coals. This finally burned up the residue left behind and I was able to scrape it all out and re wash and reoil it. We tried using it again and had the same issues.I have really high hopes for this cast iron dutch oven and plan to keep working at it to get it working good.The lid is a perfect fit to the dutch oven and the handle has a nice enough sized opening to allow me to grab it easily with pot holders. This unit is HEAVY.One thing I was thrilled about, is the lid also fits their Utopia Kitchen Pre-Seasoned Cast-Iron Skillet, 10.25 inch, which I also received at a 50% discount. I had no issues what so ever with anything sticking to the lid. Anything that touched the lid came off with little effort.

I am beyond thrilled with these pieces of pre seasoned cast iron cookware. This round, flat cast iron pancake skillet is amazing. Over the last few years we have been setting up a camp site for summer and we have a lean too and cooking station. I have been wanting to purchase some cast iron for outdoor cooking for awhile. When given the chance to purchase these at a 50% discount, I jumped at the chance.This pancake skillet worked with no issues what so ever. I washed with hot water and then heated and re-oiled the cast iron skillet before first use to help keep the non stick. We cooked pancakes over the fire and had no issues with sticking what so ever. My daughter even added pieces of chocolate bar to her pancake and still, even after melting all over the place, it just slid right off the cast iron skillet just as well as the ones without any additions.Great cast iron pancake skillet! Would recommend.

This milk frother is made of stainless steel, which makes it super easy to spot clean, as you can not immerse the battery section in water. The battery cover pushes off super easy and FAST. When we first took the battery cover off it flew across the room, I thought it was just a fluke, but everyone who first opens it does it the same way and the kids ended up making a game out of it. Thankfully the cover is still intact and no issues.The battery compartment has an image in the inner compartment to show the direction of the AA batteries (NOT INCLUDED) Required to operate the frother. To turn the frother on, you simply press/spin? the wheel on the side of the battery compartment forward/up towards the whisk end. The whisk then stars to spin/vibrate with a force.We used this to froth milk, which took very little effort, the hardest part was figuring out how far to immerse the whisk head to create the foam you desire. Putting the whisk into the milk to far created more of a whipping effect, than a frothing effect, immerse even more and it becomes more of a funnel. I did this to mix up a little vanilla ice cream and milk and it created a nice thick shake, with very quick easy rinse clean up.I received this for my honest review, I honestly like it, will most likely use it more for a quick mixer for hot cocoa or shakes as we don't froth our milk often. Works great, seems sturdy so far. Ours has gotten a lot of use and so far still working same as day one. Would recommend.

These QR cups are definitely a fun IDEA, however when you get a bunch of drunks together to play a game, where part of the game is in their beverage cup... Well you can imagine the disaster as they are trying to scan the QR code on a cup full of liquid...Received discount for my honest, unbiased opinion... I honestly like the idea of it, but the reality is, this can cause a lot of ruined electronic devices from intoxicated people who have absolutely no balance... Would recommend for a non-drunk party, but otherwise, keep the cups empty..

I really like this bird feeder and was really looking forward to hanging it in my yard. The day it arrived I immediately opened it up to check it all out. It arrived un-assembled. In order to add seed to the mesh holder, you simply twist it from the top to connect or release it. We started to pour our seed into the metal mesh section only to have almost all of the seed fall right out.We realized that a mixed blend seed will not work with this feeder. We ended up having to use black sunflower seed to be able to keep the seed inside the mesh. This is not necessarily a problem, but black sunflower seed is much more expensive to keep on hand than mixed seed. I honestly don't see me keeping a bag on hand just for one feeder.The feeder itself is light weight, but sturdy. All metal. The green top is bright and has no sign of any wear or tear or paint peeling. I also like how the top of the feeder overhangs the metal mesh holder enough to help keep the birds out of the weather when feeding. I think that is a great feature. Received for review purpose. I honestly love the style and design, but I would prefer a smaller mesh for the seeds. Or maybe an option when ordering. Otherwise this mushroom bird feeder is great and I would recommend!

I really like these non-lego brand block people. There were a couple doubles in this pack of 20, which arrived in two separate 10 pieces sets.Each little person also came in it's own little package, completely disassembled.Each figure had:HatHeadbody2 x arms2 x handswaist2 x legsThe colors on the figures are great. The details and designs on the chest pieces are consistent and we didn't find any that had paint missing. These are not cheaply made and thrown together. A pirate looks like a pirate, the construction worker looks like a construction worker, I was a little bummed that we didn't receive a Santa looking figure, as they have pictured, but I do realize it never said a specific set of people.All pieces fit tight together. There were a few pieces that my nephew could not get pushed together by himself, however most of the people he was able to assemble without help (when he wanted too lol)The only 2 negatives I can say about this set of 20 block figures is:1. a couple multiples. Mostly different, but I do believe we had 3 sets of doubles.2. A couple of the hand pieces do not fit as tight as the rest of the hands. We were able to switch and then they were tighter, but a couple of them, it didn't matter what person we tried the hand in, it would still fall out when you tip the figure upside down or sideways, they were just a little to small and lose. (I think there were 2 that did this)Overall I think this is a great set. Received for purchase code to leave an honest review. I honestly like this set. Would recommend and will probably purchase additional sets for my other nephews now.

As much as I wanted to love these rapid fill water balloon system, I just can't get past the amount of wasted water. The screw top attachment threads easily onto the end of the hose with no issues. Being plastic I paid close attention to this detail and the threads were great.The part that gets a little frustrating is when you turn the water one to fill the balloons, it is quite hard to get a good feel of how fast or slow you should let the water flow. Going to slow, not only takes forever to fill the balloons and after years of filling 100's at a time for birthday parties and other get together this was somewhat annoying feeling like I could do faster by hand. BUT... If you turn it up to far, some balloons fill really fast and pop right off while the others still go slow. So while the others are still filling their is water coming out the tubes where the first fast fills fell off.Trying to find a happy medium is difficult and there is a lot of wasted water. We have a spring fed well, so this actually does not effect us as much as it might someone else, but I still don't like wasting that much, especially when you plan on filling multiple sets at a time. I guess I was looking for more consistency. Where all the balloons fill and drop off within a few seconds of each other, not almost minutes from the first to the last.The unit as a whole seems to be pretty sturdy and we had no issues with the balloons falling off without being filled first. Even with everyone checking them out, being the great  newest thing, passing around did not remove any balloons. They stayed securely attached.Received at a discounted rate for my honest opinion. I honestly thought they were neat and great idea, but after using them, I will most likely go back to hand tying to eliminate the water waste and like I said after years and years of doing it this way, were pretty fast anyways.

I received this three piece set and another 4 piece set (https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00SF4K2KG) from this company for an extreme discount. Aside from the colors, both sets of these charger blocks are exactly the same. Both set are slightly over and inch cubes. I have used these and shared these with many family members and not one person has had an issue using these with their devices. These have been used with Samsung, apple, HTC and a few non name brand devices and all worked just fine. No issues. Great color choices. No complaints or negatives and we have been using them for over a month now. I have no cons to give less than five stars and would recommend!

I received this four piece set and another 3 piece set (https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00SGMWCR8) from this company for an extreme discount. Aside from the colors, both sets of these charger blocks are exactly the same. Both set are slightly over and inch cubes. I have used these and shared these with many family members and not one person has had an issue using these with their devices. These have been used with Samsung, apple, HTC and a few non name brand devices and all worked just fine. No issues. Great color choices. No complaints or negatives and we have been using them for over a month now. I have no cons to give less than five stars and would recommend!

These earbuds are a nice decent quality. They look nice. Sound quality is great. The noise isolation is great and really helps the amplified effect. I also like that the ear piece is not stationary and has a little move and give since no ears seem to be exactly alike. Received discount for review, overall satisfied with my purchase. NOt much else to say, they are standard quality ear buds with great sound. Would recommend.

Fits my Samsung galaxy tab 2 10.1 perfectly. I did not have very much to trim away. The instructions were easy to follow.The screen film is crystal clear and does not leave my screen looking dull. The film is not noticeable and does not hinder the visual on the screen. received for review. I personally think it works great. Fits great. No issues thus far!

Snowflake baking cutters are great. I wasn't sure how well these were going to work with all the detailed edges and points of these snowflakes. I realize these are for sugar-crafts such as fondants and the like, but I wanted to use them to make snowflake cookies for the top of "Frozen" themed cupcakes. I was a little leery when I first started and I put a mix of flour and powdered sugar in a pile and I would dip the cutters in the mix before cutting the cookie dough. This worked well for the large and medium size snowflakes with no issues what so ever. The smallest one was not as cooperative. My daughter then had the idea to try the smallest cutter on some flattened airhead candies. The smallest snowflake cutter went through that with no issues at all. Received for review. Would definitely recommend. We had a lot of fun with these and can't wait till the holiday season to use them on everything!!

Large, clear easy to see inside. This zippered tote bag is big enough to take to the beach or use for everyday. With the see through, I personally would use this more of an accessory bag for overnights. The bag itself is a thicker plastic material, with pink fabric trim. The trim and the plastic are kept together with stitching. I like this as it makes it seem more sturdy and secure.The bag is made in a square shape and had a bottom base piece to help keep the bag standing when filling. It also included a carry strap and matching pouch. Received for review. I like it, my nieces like it. Would recommend.

This collapsible lantern is probably one of my favorite camping gadgets for the kiddos. While the light is super bright and very conveient, the unit itself is very light weight and easy to use.I like how it slides down inside itself for easy storage. The handles also fold down out of the way. When you want to use the lantern, you simply pull the handles up, and then proceed to pull the unit from the top of the lantern, up to the desired illumination you want.
